attributes.action: raise the pay of the Paramedic emergency service provided by the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
-The work is physically demanding and can be stressful and emotional. 

-Ambulance crew are amongst the most likely of public service workers to suffer injury in the workplace, largely due to the nature of the work but also as a result of experiencing aggression and violence.

-Nightshift and weekend working can impact on social life.

-Paramedic salaries range from £18,698 to £24,198.

This is not enough.These people do so much for us,they are mainly understaffed and work large amounts of overtime to save our lives.
Please show your support and sign your name.
